pageProps.data:
## Cast

###### Description

Change the texture data type

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source to be changed.|
|**dtype**|<var>string</var>|The destination data type|

###### Example

```js
gm.cast(inputImage, 'float32');
```
